metadata.dc:author: Sánchez Conejo-Mir, J
Camacho, F
Moreno, J C
Sánchez-Pedreño Guillén, P
metadata.dc:description: The fortieth observation in the world literature and the four in Spain of Zinsser-Cole-Engman. Syndrome is presented, and for this reason we have reviewed the clinical, hematological, genetical and diagnostic features of this disease.
metadata.dc:title: Síndrome de Zinsser-Cole-Engman. Disqueratosis congénita.
[Zinsser-Cole-Engman syndrome. Congenital dyskeratosis].
